subject: [Radiance-general] reinsrc.cal
body:
Andy,

Thank you for clarifying this. I was wondering why rcalc doesn't find
reinsrc.cal
like other Radiance programs.
Thanks to Greg's 5-phase method, I am learning a lot about Radiance.

Leyla
